title: DatePickerFlyout: selected date not updated from source
body: A DatePickerFlyout whose Date is two-way bound will update target-to-source but not source-to-target.

comments.body: This bug is not fixed for over two years now!!!!!!
The DatePickerFlyout's UI is not updated if only the day is changed programmatically. But when the month or year is updated, everything works OK. Very confusing bug.
Binding issues plague the UWP framework. We need things like this fixed to get MVVM working again like WPF.
